Inspiration: Inspiration is the windfall from hard work and focus. — Helen Hollick
Inspiration comes from within yourself. One has to be positive. When you're positive, good things happen. — Deep Roy
The greatest inspiration is often born of desperation. — Comer Cottrell
Inspiration exists, but it has to find us working. — Pablo Picasso
I find inspiration in nature, people, music, books, and everyday life. — Dayanara Torres
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. — Steve Jobs
You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do. — Henry Ford
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions. — Dalai Lama
The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others. — Mahatma Gandhi
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today. — Franklin D. Roosevelt
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now. — Chinese Proverb

Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world. — Roy T. Bennett

Wisdom: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something. — Plato
Wisdom is not a product of schooling but of the lifelong attempt to acquire it. — Albert Einstein
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing. — Socrates
A wise man speaks because he has something to say, a fool because he has to say something. — Plato
Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness. — Sophocles
Common sense is not so common. — Voltaire
The only true wisdom is knowing that you know nothing. — Socrates
Wisdom is knowing what to do next; skill is knowing how to do it, and virtue is doing it. — David Starr Jordan
The wise person questions himself, the fool others. — Henri Clouzot
Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens. — Jimi Hendrix
Wisdom is not a matter of age, but of will and of character. — Stefan Zweig
Wise men learn by other men's mistakes, fools by their own. — H.G. Bohn
The only source of knowledge is experience. — Albert Einstein
The wise man doesn't give the right answers, he poses the right questions. — Claude Levi-Strauss
To be wise is to know what you don't know. — Confucius
The wise man's eyes are in his head, but the fool walks in darkness. — Ecclesiastes 2:14
Wisdom is the daughter of experience. — Leonardo da Vinci
The only real wisdom is in knowing you know nothing. — Socrates
Life: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience. — Eleanor Roosevelt
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on. — Robert Frost
The good you do today may often be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway. — Mother Teresa
The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams. — Oprah Winfrey
Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it. — Charles R. Swindoll
Life is like a camera, focus on the good times, develop from the negatives, and if things don't work out, take another shot. — Ziad K. Abdelnour
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced. — Soren Kierkegaard
Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be. — Grandma Moses
The meaning of life is to find your own meaning. — Viktor E. Frankl
Life is a journey, not a destination. — Ralph Waldo Emerson
The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for a newer and richer experience. — Eleanor Roosevelt
The biggest challenge in life is being yourself… in a world trying to make you like everyone else. — Unknown
Life is a book, some chapters are sad, some are happy, and some are exciting. But if you never turn the page, you will never know what the next chapter holds. — Unknown
Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life. — Avril Lavigne
Life is a precious gift, never take it for granted. — Unknown
Life is too short to waste time on things that do not matter. — Unknown
Life is too short to be anything but happy. — Unknown
The goal of life is to make your heartbeat match the beat of the universe, to match your nature with Nature. — Joseph Campbell
Life is not a rehearsal, this is it. — Unknown
Life is too short to wait for someone else to make it better. — Unknown
Life is too short to stress yourself with people who do not even deserve to be an issue in your life. — Unknown
Love: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. And that’s what you’ve given me. That’s what I’d hoped to give you forever. — Nicholas Sparks
I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear. — Martin Luther King Jr.
The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness. — William Saroyan
Love is not just looking at each other, it’s looking in the same direction. — Antoine de Saint-Exupery
Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused. — Paulo Coelho
Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies. — Aristotle
Love is not a feeling of happiness. Love is a willingness to sacrifice. — J.D. Salinger
The best love is the kind that settles into every corner of your being and spreads into a comfortable peace. — Unknown
Love is an endless act of forgiveness. Forgiveness is me giving up the right to hurt you for hurting me. — Beyoncé
Love is not a feeling of happiness. Love is a choice you make every day to sacrifice your own needs for the needs and happiness of your partner. — Unknown
Love is not about finding someone who completes you. It’s about finding someone who accepts and loves you for who you are. — Unknown
The greatest love story is when you fall in love with the most unexpected person at the most unexpected time. — Unknown
Love is not just about being with someone, it’s about feeling like you belong with them. — Unknown
True love is not about finding someone who completes you, but finding someone who accepts and loves you for who you are. — Unknown
Love is the voice under all silences, the hope which has no opposite in fear; the strength so strong mere force is feebleness: the truth more first than sun, more last than star. — E.E. Cummings
Love is not a feeling of happiness. It’s a commitment to someone to always be there for them, through the good times and the bad. — Unknown
Love is not just about holding hands and walking together, it’s about having each other’s back, no matter what. — Unknown
Love is a promise that is always kept, a fortune that can never be spent, a seed that grows into a mighty tree. — Unknown

Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible—it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could. — Barbara De Angelis
